freenet.clients.http.filter
Interface ContentDataFilter

All Known Implementing Classes:
BMPFilter, CSSReadFilter, GIFFilter, HTMLFilter, JPEGFilter, PNGFilter
public interface ContentDataFilter

Data filter for a specific MIME type.
